Reviews.Title: So happy with this camera setup!
Reviews.Author: agreatday
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to put up at my barn, to watch my mares for foaling. It was an effortless plug and play setup. So easy, the picture quality is beautiful and I couldn't be happier. I'm thinking about switching my network camera setup for more like this one. I am completely pleased with it and so happy this is the product I chose.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4GHz wireless audio/video sender; dynamic selection technology to resist interference
H.264 wireless digital; color ccd camera
Image processor MPEG4 encode/decode; variable video bit rate, up to 12 mbps
Uses random ID codes to protect personal privacy; over 4 million sets of random ID codes
Camera has 24 IR LEDs for night vision; operating distance up to 1000 feet (clear line-of-sight)
ProductInfo.Name: Astrotel WD1-C/CAM 2.4GHz H.264 Digital Wireless Transmitter with Color CCD Camera and Receiver
